title: The Visual Encyclopedia of Serial Killers
description: From Jack the Ripper to Jeffrey Dahmer, the serial killer has always had a strang ehold over the public's imagination. They remain a fascinating enigma-how can they carry on apparently normal lives while carrying out acts of the utmost deprativity. Not always axe-wielding madmen, they could be anyone you meet-your neighbor, your colleague, or even your partner.
author: Nigel Blundell
